content:

### Events
- GDP miss with hot inflation components, base rate path extended
- October close: compliance 89.9%, watchlist 17, material breach 6, default rate 2.0%, PIK balance $54.2M, revolver draw rate 59.3%, amendment fee income $1.29M, portfolio yield 12.46%
- Annual lender meeting: portfolio company XYZ Q4 results

### Notes
- Month-end summary. Compliance dropped from 95.9% to 89.9%. Watchlist doubled from 8 to 17. Material breaches tripled from 2 to 6. PIK elections 15 vs 3 average. Revolver draw rate 42.4% to 59.3%. Median DSCR from 1.38x to 1.00x. Recovery rate 68.4% to 64.4%. Portfolio yield up 64bps to 12.46% (base rate tailwind). Amendment fee income $1.29M (record). Q3 financials cycle revealed broad stress. Base rate staying high will continue compressing coverage ratios into Q4.

### Market Benchmarks
- Leveraged Loan Index: 96.71
- Direct Lending Yield Pct: 11.38
- Middle Market Spread Bps: 584
- Default Rate Trailing 12M Pct: 2.0

### Regulatory Compliance
- BDC Leverage Ratio 1.15x within limits
- Annual Auditor Confirmation Letters Distributed
